biotools.summary: NOrMAL (NucleOsome Mapping ALgorithm) is a command line tool for accurate placing of the nucleosomes. It was designed to resolve overlapping nucleosomes and extract extra information (“fuzziness”, probability, etc.) of nucleosome placement.

bioschemas.name: NOrMAL
bioschemas.summary: NOrMAL (NucleOsome Mapping ALgorithm) is a command line tool for accurate placing of the nucleosomes. It was designed to resolve overlapping nucleosomes and extract extra information (“fuzziness”, probability, etc.) of nucleosome placement.
